events.comment: first time outside should start cutscene where emily bring bad news about princess missing
Events related to popup cutscene - bad news about princess missing
que lindo dia, emiliy yell help, quinting, emily running forward, peters surprised, emily running towards peter
plays emilys running animation and sounds
when emily stops running, plays tired animation and peter can talk to her
if peter talks to emily, the  popup conversation - bad news about princess missing
PopUp of Peter and Emilys conversation

parameters: "¡Pedro, tenemos un gran problema! La PRINCESA está perdida!"
"¡No sé, ella esta perdida!  Necesitas ir al CASTILLO. Habla con el REY"
"Es tu planta de maíz, necesita agua"
"Todavía es muy pequeña, no puedes recogerla, necesita agua"
